Transcription for 1013566

First loud, quick in the air,
Lower the Topause,
sounding in the specialty.
Let own pleasure be fulfilled.
By my friend, Lord in love,
Let me praise thy love enough.
Be a leadeth me on my ways,
Let me know thy might alone.
God my brother, holy, good heart,
In thy love will I find home.
By my friend, God, for God I pray,
Let me praise thy love enough.
